Package destiny.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Screen
    This is the interface that must be implemented by all Screens that are added to the ScreenManager
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventHandler
    This class handles all events that are triggered in the PApplet and filters them to any listeners on those events
    FadeGif
    This class uses the existing PGif class and adds fading functionality to it
    FadeImage
    This class uses the PImage class from processing and adds fading capability to it
    FadeVideo
    This class uses the Movie class from processing and adds fading capability to it
    PButton
    This class represents a button that can be added to a PApplet.
    PGif
    This class uses the OpenImaging GifDecoder to make a gif that is drawable to a PApplet
    ScreenManager
    This class manages all the screens in the game and decides which one should be drawn and when
    SoundPlayer
    A class that plays wav files because that is all java supports
